altTitles.ja: 怪獣８号 RELAX

description.en: A spin-off gag manga of “Kaiju No. 8”! The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have “off-duty” days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don’t miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby Anthology Comic STAR

altTitles.en: Umamusume Pretty Derby Anthology Comic STAR

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー アンソロジーコミック STAR

description.en:
From the first volume

The first ever official "Uma Musume" anthology comic!!
The works of such amazing writers are all gathered in this book. Once you read it, you'll end up liking "Uma Musume" even more! Enjoy these 11 stories, filled with cuteness and fun!!

altTitles.ja: シックスハーフ

description.en:
Kikukawa Shiori wakes up from a motorcycle accident only to find out she's lost her memory! Try as she might, she can't remember anything about the yankee-looking boy who claims to be her boyfriend, her kind-hearted and good looking older brother, or her aloof and introverted younger sister.  
  
When she goes to school for the first time since her accident, she overhears people talking about her—and the things they say aren't flattering. From what she hears, she was a terrible person before the accident. Was she really as horrible as they're making her out to be? And will she ever get her memory back?

altTitles.ja: 猫塚くんは秘密をかぶる

description.en: Mei Komatsu (28) was dumped by her boyfriend because "Do you really like me? I wanted  to spoil you more". What does it mean to be spoiled? On nights like this, she misses her parents' cat. He is like a cat at home, and Mei can't leave him alone. One day, she can't bear to see Nekozuka, who is exhausted from the welcome party, and decides to take him home with her. One day, she woke up in the morning and heard his voice. When she woke up in the morning and looked toward his voice, she found a black cat... (Why?!?!). (Why? A cat on the futon where Nekozuka-kun was!) Mei finds out Nekozuka-kun's big secret--? A dream pet life with Nekozuka-kun! I will make Nekozuka-kun happy!
description.id: Mei Komatsu (28) dicampakkan oleh pacarnya karena "Apa kau benar-benar menyukaiku? Padahal aku ingin kau lebih bermanja-manja padaku." Mei tak mengerti bagaimana caranya bermanja-manja. Pada malam yang sepi seperti itu, dia jadi benar-benar merindukan kucing yang ada di rumah orang tuanya. Nekozuka-san adalah teman kerja Mei. Bagi Mei, dia terlihat seperti kucing yang ada di rumah orang tuanya sehingga Mei tak pernah bisa membiarkannya sendirian. Suatu hari, Mei menolong Nekozuka yang mabuk sepulang minun-minum dan memutuskan untuk membawanya ke rumahnya. Ketika dia terbangun pada pagi harinya, ada seekor kucing hitam di kamarnya. "Kenapa?! Kenapa ada seekor kucing di tempat Nekozuka tidur semalam?!" Dan kemudian Mei pun mengetahui rahasia besar yang selama ini disembunyikan oleh Nekozuka. Menjalani hidup impian dengan Nekozuka sebagai hewan peliharaannya, tentu saja dia akan membuat Nekozuka bahagia!!

altTitles.ja: 波原さんはぶちまけたい！

description.en:
The company she entered was a black IT company... It's such a pain... I want to quit... "Boss, will you please die soon? (Good morning!)"

With a sudden change (?), her honne (inner thoughts) and tatemae (public behavior) switched!? It's always been what she thinks, but, but... As a worker, she can't say it!?  
  
Her hidden "inevitable" honne, becomes a shield against harsh superiors! A pleasant and thrilling comedy!

altTitles.ja: オメガトライブ

description.en: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

altTitles.ja: 中村くんの金パは柔らかい

description.en:
Seemingly delinquent high schooler Nakamura-kun is actually shy at heart with dexterous hands and as skilled as any domestic goddess. He falls for fellow student Hayashi-san, a beautiful ojousan and honors student at their school but…  
  
A moe gap love comedy about Nakamura-kun's cute handmade goods and using overflowing feelings for sweets making and plush toy production!

altTitles.ja: 聖巫女の守護者
聖巫女（シアリズ）の守護者

description.de: Eine Meister-Sklaven-Fantasie zwischen dem Wächter, der seine Geliebte verloren hat, und der legendären Heiligen! Sabi, der in seiner Stadt als Ketzer geächtet wird, trifft Alice, ein Mädchen mit einem besonderen Schicksal. Alice wählt Sabi als ihren Partner – den „Guardian“ –, allerdings verliert sie ihr Leben durch einen seltsamen Vorfall in der Stadt. Doch plötzlich erwacht sie mit der Seele der erhabenen „Heiligen“, die in ihr wohnt, wieder zum Leben…?!
description.en: A master-slave fantasy between the guardian who lost his beloved and the legendary saint! Sabi, who is shunned as a heretic in his town, meets Alice, a girl with a special fate. Alice chooses Sabi as her partner— the “Guardian” —but she loses her life to a strange incident in the town. But she suddenly comes back to life with the soul of the exalted “Holy Saint” that resides inside her...?!
description.ja: 愛する人を失った守護者×伝説の巫女、主従ファンタジー！町で異端者とよばれるサビは、特別な運命を背負った少女・アリスと出会う。選ばれしパートナー・“守護者”にサビを選ぼうとするアリスだが、町の怪異により命を落としてしまう。突如息を吹き返した彼女に宿ったのは、なんと伝説の“聖巫女”の魂で――!?

description.en: A gorgeous Omega transmigrated into a normal society, and he collapsed on the street after getting intoxicated by the pheromone he released.
description.zh: 貌美omega一朝穿越进正常社会，竟因自己释放的信息素醉倒在街头。

altTitles.ja: ボンクラボンボンハウス

description.en:
A neet, building a house?!
From “3am Dangerous Zone” and “Third-Generation Chemist Kyubee” author, Nemu’s Yoko’s latest work!

After dropping out of college without her parent’s consent, Kazuki returns to her hometown. Back in home, she manages to get her furious parents give her the remaining 2 million yen from her tuition and decides to live in her grandmother’s renovated beauty parlor.

However, even with her unstoppable 2 million yen, it isn’t enough for Kazuki to work on the house and fulfill all of her desires!!!
She ends up renting a part of the house to Seidai, a hairdresser, who was looking for a place to settle down his shop, but before that… it must be renovated…

With the help of Eikichi, a former interior designer, walls and ceilings will be teared down, restoring Kazuki’s house from top to bottom, and with that, Kazuki’s DIY life will officially begin…!

What’s to come to the DIY life of this blockhead? Maybe love will come?

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.ja: フラレガール
失恋GIRL

description.en: The drop-dead-gorgeous and high-sex-appeal Akasaka Hibiki is going through breakup blues. Soon after being dumped, she's asked to become her schoolmate Aoyama-kun's mistress?! Aoyama-kun will try to gain Hibiki's affections through different means, so let's just hope he doesn't nosebleed to death in the process.

title.en: After Listening to What Inside My Mind the Female Leads Want to Flung Into My Harem

altTitles.zh: 反派: 被偷听心声后 女主想当 我后宫!?

altTitles.zh-ro: Fanpai: Bei Tou Ting Xinsheng Hou, Nv Zhu Xiang Dang Wo Hougong!?

altTitles.en: The Villain: After Eavesdropping on My Thoughts, the Heroine Wants to Be in My Harem!?

altTitles.vi: Nhân Vật Phản Diện: Sau Khi Nghe Lén Tiếng Lòng, Nữ Chính Muốn Làm Hậu Cung Của Ta!

altTitles.zh: 反派：女主偷听我心声人设崩了

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: さるまね

description.en: Despite the food shortages caused by famine, the mountain village where the protagonist Kai lives is able to pursue a somewhat better life than others by hunting wild animals. However, one day, a man who says he got lost in the mountains comes to the village. Kai is suspicious of the man, who refuses to make eye contact, but he and his family welcome him. That night, another uninvited beast though sneaks into the outskirts of the village...
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

altTitles.ja: ガルルガール

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!

altTitles.ja: 理想と恋

description.en:
Three original stories about adult women, ideals, and love. The first two are one chapter each, with a 3 part story for the end. 

1 - Doorbell and Idol
2 - Picnic
3-5 - If a Lotus Should Bloom

“My Ideal, My Love” has arrived! - a yuri anthology focusing on adults!

An anthology focusing on the ideals and loves of women! Stories include a former idol X delivery driver, and a clothing sales clerk X baker. As each of them are adults, you get to see their struggles, their indecision, and how each of their ideals take shape. It’s now time for ideals and love!

title.en: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!

altTitles.ja: 現実(リアル)もたまには嘘をつく
現実もたまには嘘をつく
ゲーム好きの友達と色々する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Gemuzuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl

altTitles.uk: Іноді навіть реальність може бути оманливою

altTitles.hi: कभी कभी सच भी झूठ होता है!

altTitles.zh: 和喜欢游戏的朋友各种轶事

altTitles.zh-hk: 和喜歡游戲的朋友各種軼事

altTitles.vi: Đi chơi cùng nữ game thủ
Hẹn hò cùng nữ game thủ

description.en: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
description.fr: Terazaki Kaoru est sur le point de rencontrer son ami en ligne, Nanami. Mais Nanami ne sait pas que Terazaki est en réalité un homme dans la vie réelle! Il sera certainement déçu et dégouté. Mais Terazaki va lui avoir aussi une surprise…
description.id:
Terazaki Kaoru akan bertemu dengan salah satu teman dari Game Online yang dia mainkan bernama Nanami. Namun, Nanami hanya tahu kalau Kaoru di dalam Game adalah karakter perempuan imut yang bernama Kaori, tapi dia tidak tahu kalau Kaoru di dunia nyata sebenarnya adalah seorang laki-laki.

Saat bertemu dengannya nanti, Nanami pasti akan kecewa dan merasa sedikit aneh, namun… Ketika bertemu, Kaoru pun sontak ikut terkejut. Karena Nanami ternyata…
description.it: Terazaki Kaoru sta per incontrare il suo amico di internet, Nanami. Ma Nanami non sa che Terazaki è un ragazzo nella realta! Con questo Nanami Potrebbe rimanerci delusa o forse trovarlo strano (considerando che l' avatar di Kaoru è femminile), ma ciò che il ragazzo non sa, è che riceverà una sorpresa a sua volta…
description.ja:
友達以上、恋人未満のふたりが繰り広げるハイテンションラブコメディ!

ゲーム好きな男の子、薫はネットゲームで知り合った男性と駅で待ち合わせ。女性キャラを使っていたせいで女の子だと勘違いされていることを心配する薫だが、待ち合わせ場所にやってきたのはかわいい女の子で……?
description.pt: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…
description.ru:
Заядлый геймер Каору Тэрадзаки собирается встретиться с подругой Нанами, с которой познакомился в онлайн-игре. До этого они не виделись в реальной жизни, так что Нанами не знает, что, хотя в игре Тэрадзаки использовал женского персонажа, в реальной жизни он — парень. Каору убеждён, что Нанами наверняка будет разочарована этим фактом, но его ждёт сюрприз...

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/124209-real-mo-tama-ni-wa-uso-wo-tsuku))
description.uk: Каору Теразакі — геймер, котрий захоплюється MMORPG, там він знайшов друга, з котрим товаришував протягом досить тривалого проміжку часу. І ось настав час зустрітися з ним особисто – поза межами онлайн. Та все не так просто, як здавалося на перший погляд, так як Каору грав під дівочим аватаром, його товариш вважає, що той – дівчина. Каору знаходиться у тривожному передчутті, що як його друг буде розчарований? Ба більше, на нього також чекав сюрприз – замість іншого хлопця, його другом виявляється симпатична дівчина – Нанамі Осака. До того ж, Нанамі заздалегідь попередила батьків, що приведе з собою друга – подругу. Ситуація ускладняється тим, що у Нанамі занадто турботливий тато, котрий віддубасить кожного хлопця, котрий посміє наблизитися до його доньки. Ця дилема має лише одне рішення: Каору треба переодягтися в дівчину! Чи окупляться зрештою зусилля Каору?! Чи залишаться Каору та Нанамі просто друзями, чи час, який вони провели у реальному житті разом, все змінить? Слідкуйте за їхніми романтичними пригодами, щоб дізнатися!
description.pt-br: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…

altTitles.ja: 木曜日のフルット

description.en: Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

altTitles.ja: ぬくぬく四コマめし

description.en: A series of 4koma comics featuring Osage-chan by Nukunuku Nigirimeshi (@NKNK_NGRMS).

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm Official Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou Koushiki Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上~司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません~ 公式コミックアンソロジー
蝶獣戯譚Ⅱ

description.en: This is a story of Ochou, a shinobi who lives under the name of Kochou, a courtesan, displaying as such in order to hunt other shinobi who have lost their way.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

title.en: Kuro Hakushaku wa Hoshi o Mederu

altTitles.ja: Kuro Hakushaku wa Hoshi wo Mederu
Kurohakushaku wa Hoshi o Mederu
Kurohakushaku wa Hoshi wo Mederu

altTitles.en: The Black Count Loves the Star

altTitles.ja: 黒伯爵は星を愛でる

description.en:
A Cinderella story with a twist!  
  
Esther Mayfield is a normal sixteen year old girl in 19th Century London. Except, ever since she was a little girl, she could see 'ghosts'. She lives in a small part of town and sells flowers to earn a living. She thought that she would continue to live like this forever.  
  
Until, one day, a handsome young Count appears in front of her. And he wants Esther to be his bride? Is he really the Prince Charming she has been waiting for?

title.en: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

altTitles.en: The Golden Word Master - The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat

altTitles.ru: Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом

altTitles.ja: 金色の文字使い-勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート-

altTitles.ko: 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

title.en: How to Gracefully Divorce a Dragon

altTitles.en: How to Divorce a Dragon Beautifully

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

title.en: Gokushufudou: The Way of the House Husband

altTitles.ja: 極主夫道

description.en:
Immortal Tatsu is an ex-yakuza who’s given up violence for making an honest man of himself - but is it still possible for a devoted stay-at-home husband to get into a few scrapes?

---
- Won 3rd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018).  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award in the Best Humor Publication category.
---
- [English Edition on Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B07X1PGY7N)
- [French Edition](https://www.kana.fr/produit/la-voie-du-tablier)
---
- [Official Colored JP version <Comico>](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29947)
- [Official Colored ENG version <PocketComics>](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/319)
description.es:
**Todo negocio es negocio serio.**  
El dragón inmortal Tatsu es un ex-yakuza que ha abandonado la violencia para convertirse en un hombre recto, pero ¿es posible para un devoto amo de casa con un pasado así mantenerse fuera de problemas?

---
- Won 3rd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018).  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award in the Best Humor Publication category.
---
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kousuke_oono)

---

- [Official Colored ENG version <PocketComics>](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/319)
description.ru:
**Все дело серьезное дело.**  
Бессмертный Тацу — бывший член клана якудза, который решил завязать с насилием и стать честным человеком. Удастся ли ему оставаться преданным мужем и хорошим домохозяином, не ввязавшись при этом в различные неприятности?

---
- Won 3rd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018).  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award in the Best Humor Publication category.
---

description.tr:
''Ölümsüz Tatsu'' şiddet olaylarını bırakan, dürüst bir adam olma yolundaki eski bir yakuzadır -fakat yine de, onun evdeki huzur dolu günlerinin bozulmasının imkanı var mıdır ki?  

---
- Won 3rd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018).  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award in the Best Humor Publication category.

description.pt-br: Tatsu Imortal é um ex-yakuza que abandonou a violência para se tornar um homem honesto. Mas será que ainda é possível para um devoto marido dono de casa se meter em alguns problemas?!

altTitles.ja: 灰仭巫覡

description.en: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
description.ru: Ночь — феномен, некогда считавшийся природной катастрофой. Под угрозой уничтожения от не пойми чего, дети вознесли богам свои молитвы в форме танца, чтобы одолжить их силу, сдержать ярость Ночи и возродить мир из руин. По велению судьбы Дзин, парнишка из захолустного японского городка, встречает Гао, британского солдата, вынужденного покинуть свою страну из-за Ночи. Вдвоём они безмятежно проводили время вместе с друзьями в тихом городке в окружении природы. Пока однажды Ночь вновь не обрушилась на них!

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

altTitles.es-la: No puedo aprovecharme de mis esclavas por la talentosas que son

description.en: A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, "Restoration." Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye. The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
転生した少年・アレンは女神からチート能力【再生】を授かる。
ありとあらゆるケガや病気を治療できるものの、活躍の場は限られるため、奴隷の少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策する。
だが、完治した奴隷たちのチートがダンチすぎて、農作物や居住環境は瞬く間に完熟。
活躍の場を次々に奪われる主人公・アレンは現代知識で対抗するが、それも優秀な奴隷たちが吸収し、商売で大成功。
主人公の影がどんどん薄くなっていく……！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

altTitles.ja: 不安の種*

description.en: Continuing in the same vein as previous installments, a new collection of "everyday horror" vignettes.

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

title.en: Moto Isekai Tenisha datta Kachou no Ojisan, Jinsei Nidome no Isekai wo Kake Meguru

altTitles.ja: 元異世界転移者だった課長のおじさん、人生二度目の異世界を駆け廻る

altTitles.en: The Section Chief Uncle Who's a Former Transferee to Another World Goes to Another World a Second Time

altTitles.ko: 전 이세계 전이자였던 과장 아저씨, 인생 두 번째 이세계를 누빈다

description.en:
Souya, the manager of a trading company in a small city, is a 37-year-old office worker who enjoys single life.

One day, when he wakes up in a strange meadow, he sees two moons floating in the night sky and regains the memory of being transferred to another world 20 years ago.

An uncle’s adventure in a different world, wearing a business suit, with a low amount of tension, a high level of ability, and a cool but slightly pathetic personality. It’s a different world transition, but it may have an old-fashioned fantasy atmosphere.

"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.

title.en: Playboy Repents and is Reborn into a Complicated Relationship with Five People

altTitles.zh: 海王从良后陷入了五等分修罗场

altTitles.en: The Playboy Has Reformed After Falling Into Five Equal Love Complex

altTitles.id: Si Playboy yang Bereinkarnasi Terjebak dengan Lima Haremnya

altTitles.zh-ro: Hǎiwáng Cóngliáng Hòu Xiànrùle Wǔ Děng Fēn Xiūluō Chǎng

description.en: The playboy is reborn at a crucial moment in '1 Day with 4 Suitors.' To survive, he sends them all breakup letters and runs away. Unexpectedly, his exes all rush to seduce him, and the guy he sought shelter with seems to have increasingly intense eyes each day! I've fallen into a complicated situationship with too many people. How do I deal with having too many husbands?

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?
  
Fun Fact :  
-Author is the illustrator for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata](https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCZlDXzGoo7d44bwdNObFacg) (天音かなた)
-Because of that, Physical copies on Amazon store soldout on the 1st day

title.en: Ushiro no Seki no Gyaru ni Sukarete Shimatta. - Mou Ore wa Damekamoshirenai

altTitles.ja: うしろの席のぎゃるに好かれてしまった。もう俺はダメかもしれない

altTitles.en: The Gal Sitting Behind Me Likes Me. - Maybe I'm Screwed Already

description.en:
***My school life has changed drastically just because she likes me that I barely talk with?!***

Yuizaki Shino, one of the most beautiful girls in the school is a classmate of Fujiwara Sandai sitting behind him. It was only on a whim that Sandai helped her out despite spent his days studying and not having a single friend. It was supposed to be―

*"I couldn't wait for after school! ....Hey, hold on a minute?"*

That day and moment led Sandai to start dating Shino. They spend time together after school, they keep up with each other's hobbies, and they stay over frequently.... She's kind-sweet and always clings to him. And somehow, the other classmates started to pay attention to Sandai, they slowly changing his style appearance, and there was a lot of talks around his belt. He's more unsettled than when Sandai alone before. ....Well, this kind of school life isn't so bad, is it?
description.ja:
何の接点も無い彼女に好かれた…だけで、俺の学園生活が激変!?

　うしろの席の同級生で、学校有数の美少女ギャル・結崎志乃。

勉強ばかりで、友達が一人もいない日々を過ごす俺が、彼女を助けたのは、ほんの気まぐれにすぎなかった。
そのはずが――

「放課後が待ち遠しかった！　……ね、ちゅーして？」

　その出来事をきっかけに、俺は志乃と付き合うことになった。
学校が終われば一緒に過ごして、お互いの趣味に付き合って、頻繁にお泊まりして……
彼女は優しく、いつも俺にべったり。

　さらにクラスメイトに注目されるようになって、俺の見た目を改造してくれたり、俺の周りも騒がしく。
一人の時より、落ち着かないんだが……ま、こんな学校生活も悪くはないか。

---

- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054921974753)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202206ushironoseki)

altTitles.ja: この子知りませんか？

altTitles.vi: Anh có biết cô bé này không?

description.en: Nakayama Ryouhei, who works at a run-down factory, sets out on a journey to accomplish the things he has left undone in his life! And by his side is an innocent girl... This is the greatest and final story of a man who has never made a decision for himself and a troubled runaway girl!! An indie masterpiece that gained popularity has evolved and is now being serialized!!

title.en: My Friend's Little Sister Has It in for Me!

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Annoying Only Towards Me

altTitles.id: Adik Perempuan Temanku Hanya Usil Kepadaku

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Only Annoying to Me

altTitles.ru: Младшая сестрёнка моего друга пристает лишь ко мне

altTitles.ja: 友達の妹が俺にだけウザい

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni Dake Uzai

altTitles.es-la: La hermana menor de mi mejor amigo solo es molesta conmigo

description.en:
I don’t need any deep relationships. I have no desire for a girlfriend, and I only require one friend who holds any value to me. Ever since I threw out my youth for the sake of efficiency, there is one person who keeps entering the bedroom of Ooboshi Akiteru. She’s neither my little sister nor my friend. She’s nothing more than a bothersome, annoying Kouhai, as well as my friend’s little sister: Kohinata Iroha. “Senpai, let’s go on a date~! Did you think I’d say that~?”. Rather than blood, it seems that energy drinks run through her veins. She keeps occupying my bed, and she tries her best to seduce me with whatever method she can play to her favor. She’s a girl who’s constantly annoying and obnoxious around me. Even though I’m busy all day long, she doesn’t care. And in case you’re wondering why all these envious gazes are directed at me, it’s because Iroha is actually really popular. She’s an honor student at our school with top grades to boot, and she’s known for being kind and proper to anyone she meets. …Hey now, why are you only so annoying when you’re around me?  

---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/imouza_PR)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikawaghost)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiraminmi)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/imouza/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/my-friend-s-little-sister-has-it-in-for-me)  
- [Alternative Raw](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/tomodachino)
description.pt: Não preciso de nenhum relacionamento profundo. Não desejo uma namorada, e só preciso de um amigo que tenha algum valor para mim. Desde que eu, Ooboshi Akiteru, joguei fora minha juventude por uma questão de eficiência, há uma pessoa que continua entrando no meu quarto. Ela não é minha irmãzinha nem minha amiga. Ela não passa de uma Kouhai chata e irritante, além da irmã mais nova do meu amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "Senpai, vamos a um encontro ~! Você achou que eu diria isso ~?". Em vez de sangue, parece que bebidas energéticas correm por suas veias. Ela continua ocupando minha cama e tenta ao máximo me seduzir com qualquer método que ela possa jogar a seu favor. Ela é uma garota que é constantemente irritante e desagradável ao meu redor. Embora eu esteja ocupada o dia todo, ela não se importa. E caso você esteja se perguntando por que todos esses olhares invejosos são direcionados para mim, é porque Iroha é realmente muito popular. Ela é uma aluna de honra da nossa escola com as melhores notas e é conhecida por ser gentil e adequada com qualquer pessoa que conhece. …Ei agora, por que você é tão irritante quando está perto de mim?
description.ru: Мне не нужны никакие глубокие отношения. У меня нет желания иметь подругу, и мне нужен только один друг, который имеет для меня хоть какую-то ценность. С тех пор как я бросил свою молодость ради эффективности, есть один человек, который продолжает входить в спальню Ообоши Акитеру. Она мне не младшая сестра и не подруга. Она не более чем надоедливый, раздражающий кохай, а также младшая сестра моего друга: Кохината Ироха. "Сэмпай, давай сходим на свидание! Неужели ты думал, что я так скажу?”. Кажется, что по ее венам текут не кровь, а энергетические напитки. Она по-прежнему занимает мою постель и изо всех сил старается соблазнить меня любым способом, который может сыграть ей на руку. Она - девушка, которая постоянно раздражает и раздражает меня. Хотя я весь день занят, ей все равно. И если вам интересно, почему все эти завистливые взгляды направлены на меня, это потому, что Ироха действительно очень популярна. Она почетная ученица в нашей школе с высшими оценками в придачу, и она известна своей добротой и порядочностью ко всем, кого она встречает. "Эй, почему ты так раздражаешь меня, только когда рядом со мной?"
description.es-la: No necesito una relación profunda. No tengo deseo por una novia, y solo requiero un amigo que tenga algún valor para mí. Desde que deseche mi juventud a favor de la eficiencia, hay una persona que sigue entrando al dormitorio de Ooboshi Akiteru. Ella no es mi hermanita o mi amiga. Ella no es nada más que una molestia, una molesta kouhai, así como la hermana pequeña de mi amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "¡Senpai, tengamos una cita! ¿Creíste que diría eso?" En vez de sangre, pareciera que una bebida energética corriera por sus venas. ella sigue ocupando mi cama, y ella da su mejor esfuerzo para seducirme con cualquier método que pueda usar a su favor. ella es una chica que es constantemente molesta y desagradable a mi alrededor. incluso si estoy ocupado todo el día, a ella no le importa. Y en caso de que te estés preguntando por que todas esas miradas envidiosas están dirigidas a mí, es porque Iroha es realmente popular. Ella es una estudiante de honor en nuestra escuela con las mejores calificaciones, y ella es conocida por ser amable y apropiada para cualquiera que ella conozca. Hey ahora, ¿Porque solo eres escandalosa cuando estas alrededor mío?

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

title.en: To Me Who Doesn't Love You

description.en:
“I’m Lee Suhan’s husband.”

Suhan lost all of his memories after surviving a car accident that left him in a coma for several months. The person who stuck by his side was Jo Yeonseo, a man with many secrets, who claimed to be his husband.

Although Suhan is suspicious of Yeonseo since they seem too distant to be a married couple, he is still somehow drawn to his unconditional affection.

But I thought we were getting closer, so how could he hand me divorce papers saying it’s for my sake?

title.en: S-Rank Monster no Behemoth Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Erufu Musume no Kishi (Pet) Toshite Kurashitemasu

altTitles.en: I Am Behemoth Of The S Rank Monster, But I Am Mistaken As A Cat And I Live As A Pet Of Elf Girl
I'm a “Behemoth,” an S-Ranked Monster, But Mistaken for a Cat, I Live As an Elf Girl's Pet
I’m an S-Rank "Behemoth" Monster, but I’m Living as a Knight (Pet) of an Elf Girl

altTitles.es: Soy un monstruo de rango S, Behemoth, pero me confundieron con un gato y ahora vivo como el caballero (mascota) de una chica elfa.

altTitles.ja: Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけど、猫と間違われてエルフ娘の騎士(ペット)として暮らしてます
Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけどネコと間違われてエルフ娘の騎士として暮らしています

altTitles.de: Ich bin ein mächtiger Behemoth und lebe als Kätzchen bei einer Elfe

altTitles.ru: Я монстр S-класса Бегемот, но меня перепутали с котом, и я живу у эльфийки как домашний питомец

altTitles.zh: 虽然是S级魔兽“比蒙巨兽” 却以猫的模样、成为精灵娘的骑士的日常

description.en: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
description.es:
La chica elfa, "Aria" es una aventurera. Cuando una pequeña bestia con una cara adorable abraza el fructífero pecho de Aria, ella decide tenerla como mascota y la llama "Tama". A primera vista es sólo un gato común, pero Aria aún no se ha dado cuenta de que Tama es un antiguo Caballero y que su identidad no es un gato, sino un joven monstruo de la clase más fuerte "Behemoth".  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9107ee) (Raw)  
- [Official Light Novel (EN)](https://yenpress.com/9781975332945/im-a-behemoth-an-s-ranked-monster-but-mistaken-for-a-cat-i-live-as-an-elf-girls-pet-vol-1-light-novel/)
description.pt: A garota elfa, "Aria" é uma aventureira. Uma pequena besta com um adorável rosto abraça o peito frutoso da Aria, ela decide manter como um animal de estimação chamado "Tama". Ao primeiro sinal é apenas um gato comum, mas Aria ainda não notou que esta Tama é um cavaleiro antigo e sua identidade não é de um gato, mas um jovem monstro da classe mais poderosa chamada "Behemoth".

title.en: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?

altTitles.ja: お前妹じゃなくて許嫁だったのかよ!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Omae Imouto Janakute Iinazuke Datta no ka yo

altTitles.ru: Ты была не моей сестрой, а моей невестой!?

altTitles.en: You Weren't My Sister, but My Fiancée?!

description.en:
"Humanity, adore thy little sister—."
"I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."
Shina Takashi lamented his current days, where being ignored was not uncommon. One day, his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son… but he was also the fiancé of Kana, whom he thought was his sister!

From siblings to potential romantic interests, it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions, the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! 
She’s a sister but not a sister! The curtain rises on a new era of sisterly romantic comedy!”

(MTL’d from bookwalker.jp)
description.ja:
**人類よ、妹を愛でろ――。**

いつ頃からだろう、妹の佳奈が自分に冷たくなったのは――。
無視されることさえ少なくない現在の日々を、椎名隆は嘆いていた。
そんなある日、両親から衝撃的な話を切り出される。
なんと隆は実の息子ではなかった……だけではなく、妹だと思っていた佳奈の許嫁だった！

兄妹から気になる異性へ、なんて簡単には気持ちの整理がつくはずもなく。
揺れ動く感情、戸惑う距離感。
二人の関係は否応なく変化して――!?

妹だけど妹じゃない！
新時代の妹ラブコメ、開幕！

title.en: Shinigami ni Sodaterareta Shoujo wa Shikkoku no Tsurugi wo Mune ni Idaku

altTitles.ja: 死神に育てられた少女は漆黒の剣を胸に抱く

altTitles.zh: 被死神抚养的少女怀抱漆黑之剑

altTitles.ko: 사신에게 길러진 소녀는 칠흑의 검을 가슴에 품는다

altTitles.en: Death's Daughter and the Ebony Blade
The Little Girl Raised by Death Holds the Sword of Death Tight

description.en:
Olivia is just a baby when the mysterious Z finds her at a temple in the depths of the Forest of No Return. From that day on, the temple becomes her home and Z her family. Z, a god of death, educates her in the ways of the world, in combat, and in the long-forgotten arts of magic—right up until the day Z disappears. 

Olivia leaves the forest for the first time in search of Z with its ebony blade in hand. Out in the wider world, all is not well. A bitter war rages between the Asvelt Empire and the Kingdom of Fernest, and Fernest is losing badly. When Olivia shows up on Fernest’s doorstep with a sack of imperial heads looking to volunteer, the royal army happily welcomes her into its ranks. Thanks to Z’s training, she quickly proves herself as a ferocious warrior. In fact, she might be just what Fernest needs to turn the tide of the war...but will they accept her lack of people skills and disregard for discipline? And will she ever see Z again?

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/death-s-daughter-and-the-ebony-blade)
description.pt: No fundo de um santuário esquecido dentro da floresta, um bebê é encontrado por figuras sombrias, os deuses da morte. Um deles, Zett, a pegou para usá-la como "objeto de observação" contra o desejo de seus irmãos de comer sua alma. Zett lhe deu vários conhecimentos e a treinou para lutar. Até que um dia ele de repente desapareceu, deixando-lhe uma carta e uma espada negra. Então, tendo crescido, Olivia saiu em busca de Zett. Esta é a história de Olivia Valedstorm, a garota criada pela morte, enquanto muda o curso da guerra com seu temido título de Shinigami.

title.en: Saenai Riman to Yankee Joshi Kousei

altTitles.en: Dull Businessman and Naughty High School Girl

altTitles.ja: 冴えないリーマンとヤンキー女子高生

description.en: Yamada Hiroyuki is 26 years old, has a stable job, is an otaku, but is overwhelmed by the ideas and thoughts of his family, i.e. marriage and criticism over his childish hobbies. He decides to leave the house and go to live in an apartment, alone and happy, but the perfect image he had in mind when he moved in was destroyed when he learned that his neighbor is a yankee schoolgirl. However he soon discovers her real personalty is quite awkward and very tender. Will the story of these two advance for the better?
description.pt-br: Yamada Hiroyuki tem 26 anos, tem um emprego estável, é um otaku, oprimido pelas ideias e pensamentos de sua família (quando você se casa? Você ainda assiste animes na sua idade?) Ele decide sair de casa e ir morar em um apartamento, sozinho e feliz, mas a imagem perfeita que ele tinha em mente quando se mudou, foi destruída quando soube que sua vizinha é uma yankee (delinquente) e ao mesmo tempo uma colegial, logo ele descobre que aquela garota rude e desbocada é alguém desajeitada, muito terna e muito fofa. A história desses dois jovens avançará para melhor?
